beer.name: Blonde Bombshell
beer.description: As the name implies, this is one knock-out of a beer.Â Brewed to be a light bodied, refreshing ale, Blonde Bombshell combines subtle malt and wheat flavors with a delicate Liberty hop aroma to create a sensational beer.Â Originally brewed as a seasonal, this beer was so popular it pushed its way into our regular line-up.
